text: 7:9-10 Ua Me Ini 22:21-22; Ofa Gami 19:17-18; 25:35; Godɨn Araziba 10:17-19; 15:11; Jeremaia 7:5-6; 22:3“Bar fomɨra, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, akar kam uan gumazamizibagh anɨga ghaze, ia arazir aghuibara damu gumazamizibar araziba akɨr. Egh ia uan adarazir apangkuv men akurvagh.
